CHAT.comment: GEORGIA, Petitioner v. JOHN ASHCROFT, ATTORNEY GENERAL, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:16 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF DAVID F. WALBERT ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF MALCOLM L. STEWART ON BEHALF OF THE FEDERAL RESPONDENT
ORAL ARGUMENT OF E. MARSHALL BRADEN ON BEHALF OF THE PRIVATE INTERVENORS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF DAVID F. WALBERT ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 11:14 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
